column4: Question: How do i eject a USB Device, and how do i "know" it is ejected, so i can be sure of a safe removal?
I just right click the icon on the desktop and push unmount or whatever. Or you can always do it in a terminal sudo umount /media/mountpoint
Ah thank you! I was having trouble because unmounting in the browser would still leave the icon there.. i could see no way to tell if it was in or out. This works, thank you!
